original: intros m0 m1 a H. assert (H0: map_or m0 m1 = m0 \/ map_or m0 m1 = m1). { destruct m0, m1; simpl; try (left; reflexivity); try (right; reflexivity). destruct (N.eq_dec a a0); try (left; reflexivity); right; reflexivity. } destruct H0 as [H0 | H0]; intros. - left. apply map_or_mapget_true_l with (a:=a) in H0; auto. - right. apply map_or_mapget_true_r with (a:=a) in H0; auto.
